nodes.text: Area D-502 was an area of the Dantooine system. It served as the base of operations for both the O.S.S. D-502 Junk Guild and the Aii`tkian Anthropologists.

Area D-502 was considered among the safest areas of the star system at the time of the Galactic Civil War. Both the Junk Dealers and the Anthropologists were friendly groups, always willing to lend a helpful hand.
